website_summaries.verdict: Buyers seeking a farmhouse-styled coffee container will be impressed by this product's rustic look and dependable function.
pros: Comes in a set of 3 jars with different colors available for purchase
Silicone gasket ensures an airtight product
Customers rave over the vintage-inspired look

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Love them. They add a nice vintage feel even in my very modern kitchen. I was worried that the color would be more green like mint, but instead it is more of a pastel turquoise. Stunning color. Reminds me of the pastel colors of the classic cars from the 50s. Very retro. Quality is good too. Looks high quality. The size is perfect as well. Not too big or small. It is ceramic though, so if it falls or isn’t handled properly it will break. But that’s common sense.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Jars
customer_reviews.text: Not disappointed with the product. It is what I was hoping for.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Bullock

customer_reviews.title: Cute but misleading
customer_reviews.text: Cute design. But the actual jars are like the size for putting cotton balls in and putting in bathroom. Strange size to be marketed for storing coffee and using in kitchen
customer_reviews.author: Rya

customer_reviews.title: Super cute as expected, not too small
customer_reviews.text: I bought the large cookie jar and had been drooling wanting these. I read up on them so much while stalking them that I knew they were small but I still couldn’t fight wanting them even though I wanted something bigger. Well they aren’t as small as it seemed like they would be and I absolutely love them. These are all well made and sturdy. They are a perfect match for my kitchen decor and I couldn’t be happier.
customer_reviews.author: QTPayne

customer_reviews.title: Uh! Not pleased
customer_reviews.text: I was a little disappointed with this particular item, it was not what I thought I would get, they were extremely tiny size jars, I mean tiny enough that it couldn’t be seen by anyone that walks in my kitchen, there were no spot that I tried placing it that worked! I wanted this set to be a WOW FACTOR in my New Kitchen and it simply wasn’t!
customer_reviews.author: meg Jeanty

customer_reviews.title: Nice but too small and the seal is BAD!
customer_reviews.text: Adjusting my review: These are really nice looking and seem very sturdy but the seal is BAD. My ground coffee that I put in the coffee jar was completely ruined (sticky and changed color) after 24 hours in the jar! it’s also a little too small, the tea barely holds 10 tea bags and they are totally squeezed in.
customer_reviews.author: DL

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: They were the perfect addition to my kitchen, they are by no means large but they are the perfect size. I just use them for decoration but you could definitely use them for their intended purpose. They have the seal so your goods stay dry and well kept! They came in perfect condition and they are the exact color as pictured.
customer_reviews.author: Gianna

customer_reviews.title: Happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: These jars are nicely made. They are small in size but perfect for holding small things. They add a nice touch of color to the kitchen
customer_reviews.author: Betty J

customer_reviews.title: Look really nice
customer_reviews.text: Nice but too small for what I was looking for
customer_reviews.author: Luz

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: I love these! I have them out and so not only are they useful but decorative as well. In addition, I have not noticed any issues with my coffee staying fresh so far. They are on the smaller side, but they do the job!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea L. Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Love these cute canisters!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had these for over a year and they still look great on my countertop. They are easy to clean. I like their smaller size too because unlike other canisters they don’t take up too much room.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely adorable and functional, sturdy and fun. These are worth every penny and make an adorable addition to my farmhouse kitchen theme.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous Q

customer_reviews.title: A little smaller than imagined, but still very nice.
customer_reviews.text: A little smaller than I imagined, but still nice. Gasket between lid and canister can fall off but is easy to put back on. Great to display on counter.
customer_reviews.author: Sonny Geha

customer_reviews.title: Cute and functional, seals nicely
customer_reviews.text: Super cute. I wish they were slightly bigger or maybe the sugar smaller than the others, but these are great. So happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: LcharapichTop Contributor: Nail Polish

customer_reviews.title: Very small canisters!!
customer_reviews.text: I thought these were much much bigger than the description says, I was very dissapointed.
customer_reviews.author: Tori Miles

customer_reviews.title: Cute design
customer_reviews.text: Love the design! It’s not as big as we expected though and it’s not really airtight - sugar and tea turned solid after a few days.
customer_reviews.author: LA R.

customer_reviews.title: smaller than pic seams
customer_reviews.text: love the style looks great in kitchen wish it was bigger
customer_reviews.author: Maureen

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous jars
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous mason jars. They match my aqua theme kitchen. Very sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: Rosa M.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size containers for tea, coffee, sugar.. impressed with the quality too
customer_reviews.author: puspa

customer_reviews.title: Just the right size
customer_reviews.text: I love these canisters. They are just the right size and match my cookie jar. I don't care for the ones that take up a lot of space. Counters are limited.
customer_reviews.author: sandals80

customer_reviews.title: Great and cute.
customer_reviews.text: These are so cute. I wish they weren't labeled, but it's great otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Cayce B

customer_reviews.title: Very nice jars. Some small imperfections
customer_reviews.text: Very nice jars. Some small imperfections, but I kept them anyway since it seems to add to the old-fashioned look.
customer_reviews.author: David B

customer_reviews.title: wish the seal was a bit better. Otherwise perfect
customer_reviews.text: These are very cute, wish the seal was a bit better. Otherwise perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney

customer_reviews.title: Don’t even bother
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time I’ve ordered this because the first set came with two labeled “coffee” and no sugar canister. I now own 4 coffees and 2 teas. Get it together guys! I’ll be returning both sets and asking for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: courtney kimball

customer_reviews.title: Received 2 tea jars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful jars and mostly what I expected. I was very disappointed though because I got two Tea Jars instead of a coffee and tea :-( and I specifically bought it for the coffee jar!
customer_reviews.author: Marsha Youssef

customer_reviews.title: Utterly disappointing
customer_reviews.text: This is way too small!! It could barely hold a cup of each thing it is labeled for much less a bags worth. They will be cute for display but that's about it.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Walker

customer_reviews.title: Not what's written in the description
customer_reviews.text: Such a beautiful set but got two for tea and none for coffee.. this is so not fair. :( Will have to return. Any other way to get a coffee to complete my set
customer_reviews.author: Richa Chawla

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Have been using them for almost 18 months. They look classy and cozy in the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: A. KHAN

customer_reviews.title: replacement
customer_reviews.text: I loved these jars but unfortunately I have broken the coffee jar need a replacement. Would the seller sell me just the coffee jar?
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Anne Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Love, love these. The lids are more mint in color which is exactly what I was hoping for.
customer_reviews.author: Carley McMillian

customer_reviews.title: Horrified
customer_reviews.text: Very very disappointed!!! The items didn’t come with the top nor the seal around the container
customer_reviews.author: Arzella B. Steele

customer_reviews.title: 2/3 canister
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this and received two coffee canisters and one tea canister. There was supposed to be a canister for sugar. Super cute, though.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 3

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than expected but looks beautiful in my kitchen. Not very functional unfortunately
customer_reviews.author: Charlene

customer_reviews.title: Not an airtight seal
customer_reviews.text: The seals on the lids are not tight... but they look like they are supposed to.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Sizes run small but cute
customer_reviews.text: Just what I asked for, arrived a little late but it came good to go
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Tiny
customer_reviews.text: While they are super cute they are also super tiny
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Tiny Jars
customer_reviews.text: Significantly smaller than anticipated. Holds about a cup of sugar/flour/tea. This is worthless.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Leary

customer_reviews.title: so disappointed. Very cute set
customer_reviews.text: Lids did not fit right at all. so disappointed. Very cute set. Some lids too big. Other too small and almost would not come off. Had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Cozette Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great set but I received NO tea jar
customer_reviews.text: Great set but I received NO tea jar. Just 2 Sugar jars and 1 coffee jar. I need the tea jar still.
customer_reviews.author: shopper girl

customer_reviews.title: Mini set
customer_reviews.text: Read the details! I did not fully read the discription on this product and I thought it was a normal canister set but when it arrived I was shocked that it was a mini set! My fault but just be aware. Otherwise looks like a good product.
customer_reviews.author: rebekah

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Very small! I got 2 sugars an 1 coffee. No tea. Weird!
customer_reviews.author: kevin kent

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but very small
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than expected. The tea canister only fits about 10 teabags. I kept them because they are super cheap compares to larger similar looking ones (get what you pay for). They are cute & look like pictured
customer_reviews.author: Angel Irr

customer_reviews.title: Replace lid
customer_reviews.text: These are really cute but I was very disappointed that one of the kids was missing some color on top. It isn’t a chip but a flaw in the paying process. They are like a baked ceramic and one area was missing paint. Would love to get a replacement from the seller but don’t want the hustle of sending back.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: So this product is ideal for a person who lives on his/her own. Beware, if this thing falls on the floor it will crack easily. Not that I have broken mine but I have had ceramic jars before so I know how it goes. I have mine up on a shelf and their adorable. Just be careful.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Pinzon

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: I love these. I bought them more for decor than for practicality because they are small. If you want to use them for storage they may not be the best route to go. I have them on a shelf in the kitchen as farmhouse decor. I have gotten many compliments on them!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: So cute! I just wish I would have read about the size. They are NOT typical canister size.
customer_reviews.author: Angela S.

customer_reviews.title: OBSESSED!
customer_reviews.text: So these cute little jars are awesome. Was going for a vintage vibe in my kitchen, and this fit perfectly with that. They are small but I actually liked that they're small and light. It's just sooooo cute, love the color and everything.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These go perfectly in my kitchen! We use them to hold our coffee.
customer_reviews.author: Kerri Strunk

customer_reviews.title: I would not recommend this item
customer_reviews.text: They don't close tight. I would not recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: Kayneb

customer_reviews.title: Charming little country farmhouse set!
customer_reviews.text: These are the perfect color and size for my kitchen. I didn’t want a large canister set on my counter, so this charming little set fits perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Dream Reader

customer_reviews.title: Love the quality
customer_reviews.text: These are adorable! Love the small size because my kitchen is small and they fit on my counter perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: nancy carter

customer_reviews.title: love them but much smaller than I thought they hold ...
customer_reviews.text: love them but much smaller than I thought they hold about 2 cups of sugar. If you have small space and don't mind refilling every other day they are cute and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Selina S

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: I didn't want anything big so it wouldn't take up my whole counter space and these jars are perfect!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super cute and small. Not bulky on counter. Great for small space/counter
customer_reviews.text: So cute but small. You have to refill coffe often. I love it and don’t mind refilling. It is airtight seal so leave on counter.
customer_reviews.author: Alison M B Farr

customer_reviews.title: lids
customer_reviews.text: good so far, but one of the three lids is too loose.
customer_reviews.author: Clara.H

customer_reviews.title: This set is so cute
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised to find they are so small, but since I just keep tea bags, brown and 10X sugar in them, it's ok. Match well with my sea green retro toaster oven and coffeemaker.
customer_reviews.author: C. McCune

customer_reviews.title: Very sensitive!
customer_reviews.text: Loved the color and bought these. Lids are very tight and 2 of the jars broke while taking the lid off and putting them back on!
customer_reviews.author: SM

customer_reviews.title: These are fairly small and don't hold much, the ...
customer_reviews.text: These are fairly small and don't hold much, the tea canister cracked and I had to throw it away. Cute but not with the money
customer_reviews.author: roxann hoskins

customer_reviews.title: pretty and good quality
customer_reviews.text: satisfied with this item. it's also pretty as decoration for kitchen counter
customer_reviews.author: Hailey

customer_reviews.title: Cute canisters
customer_reviews.text: Love these canisters! They have a tight seal to keep contents fresh. They were hard to open at first, but after about a month of use, they're broken in well! I highly recommend these canisters! Great quality
customer_reviews.author: Margaret C.

customer_reviews.title: Cute Canisters
customer_reviews.text: Love these canisters. They are the perfect size and very cute.
customer_reviews.author: Rosie

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: Love these! They match my kitchen perfectly and I've gotten a lot of compliments on them from guests. Great for any kind of kitchen storage, I'm currently using mine to hold tea bags.
customer_reviews.author: Sue M.

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt seal well
customer_reviews.text: Does not seal well. I'm sure my coffee will go bad.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla C

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Four stars because the rubber seal part keeps coming off when I open the sugar jar. Other than that they are cute, well made and do their purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: ... are very cute and go in my beach house perfect. I would recommend these to a friend
customer_reviews.text: These Canisters are very cute and go in my beach house perfect. I would recommend these to a friend. they are worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Krisann1031

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wife loves these. They are the prefect size for a counter top piece.
customer_reviews.author: Michael C. Randolph

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and useful
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and useful. The only fault I have is the size, buying them I knew they weren't huge but I wasn't quite prepared for how small they were. Their still useful, but not for storing a whole bag of flour, sugar, coffee, or tea.
customer_reviews.author: NMesarch

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: Love the way these look, but much smaller than expected. Much too small to put any useful amount of anything in. I could only fit 4 tea bags in the jar...wish the description had included sizes. Should have read the reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Cody Remington

customer_reviews.title: Great Product! Very Unique
customer_reviews.text: They're a little smaller than I thought, but still look very nice in my kitchen! They're very Vintage looking and unique!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Goldilocks
customer_reviews.text: These are very cute and I have had complements on them already even though I have only had them about two weeks. The color is perfect and a little more blue than pictured which is what I was hoping for. They are rather small but I knew that when I bought them so no complaints there. The only reason I docked a star is because of the seals. One of the seals was not properly attached but I was able to tear it off and replace it correctly. All three of the jars have a sort of Goldilocks effect with the seals;one fits too loose, one is too tight and the other is just right.
customer_reviews.author: Katt Ross

customer_reviews.title: Great looking. Good seal
customer_reviews.text: Great looking. Good seal. Match my Smeg roster color and complement decor in my kitchen. Very happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Luisa Jimenez

customer_reviews.title: Really just decoration too small to use
customer_reviews.text: Very small! I guess I should have paid attention more to the size. Really just decoration!
customer_reviews.author: Kristina L

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality.
customer_reviews.text: Good to just showcase and not use. Tea container broke next day. :(
customer_reviews.author: Pvene

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love them. I was afraid they were going to be big and cheap looking but they are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: one of the rubber pieces on the cover came off
customer_reviews.author: natasha edite

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely adorable
customer_reviews.text: Love the canisters. Not teal color. Tourquise color. I would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: stephani scott

product_meta.title: DII 3-Piece Vintage, Retro, Farmhouse Chic, Mason Jar Inspired Ceramic Kitchen Canister With Airtight Lid For Food Storage, Store Coffee, Sugar, Tea, Spices and More - Aqua
product_meta.description:
Size:Jar Canister| Color:AquaGreat Kitchen Accessory


 Stage your drink area with these cute jars. These three containers make a great statement in your kitchen, they are ready to hold all your go-to beverage condiments in the morning. 


Air-tight Lid
 This set combines the household essentials. With 3 canisters holding 2 cups each, store you sugar, coffee, and tea in a convenient and stylish containers.


Quality You Can Count OnMade of hand-painted ceramic with a silicone seal lid these sets are made for everyday tasks. Inspired by the classic style of a mason jar, and paired with the vintage label these canisters are perfect for displaying on your countertops, these old-fashioned looking jars are a timeless design


So Many Great Options!

To view our entire selection of ceramic products options search: DII ceramics or visit our brand page at amazon.com/dii for a full range of products.


Our Ceramic Products Include:

• Everyday Ceramic Canisters 
• Nested Ceramics
• Ceramic Treat Bowl 
• Cookie Jars 
• Cookie and Coffee Sets
• Holiday Ceramics
feature_bullets: SIMPLE, SOPHISTICATED, FUNCTIONAL - Set of 3 vintage inspired canisters for coffee, sugar, or tea, hand wash only
COMES IN THE PERFECT SIZED SET - 3 canisters 4 x 4 x 5.6" (LxWxH) - holding 2 cups (measured with water). A perfect set for your pantry or countertop to hold sugar, coffee, and tea
STYLE & VERSATILITY - Whether giving as a gift or using in your own home, these vintage inspired canisters are offer the perfect blend of style and sophistication along with terrific versatility
COORDINATE WITH DII HOME DECOR - To view more DII products visit our brand page at amazon.com/DII
AIRTIGHT SEAL KEEP FOODS FRESH - These canisters include a silicone gasket to ensure a tight fit every time. Your foods will stay fresh and safe from ants and other bugs.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars312 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
